description: Permanently deletes a  RateBasedRule. You can't delete a rule if it's still used in any WebACL objects or if it still includes any predicates, such as ByteMatchSet objects. If you just want to remove a rule from a WebACL, use  UpdateWebACL. To permanently delete a RateBasedRule from AWS WAF, perform the following steps:

parameters.name: RuleId
parameters.description: The RuleId of the  RateBasedRule that you want to delete. RuleId is returned by  CreateRateBasedRule and by  ListRateBasedRules.

parameters.name: ChangeToken
parameters.description: The value returned by the most recent call to  GetChangeToken.

nested_items.name: ChangeToken
nested_items.description: The ChangeToken that you used to submit the DeleteRateBasedRule request. You can also use this value to query the status of the request. For more information, see  GetChangeTokenStatus.
